summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Download Portal website. All core features working correctly including home page, submission system, admin authentication, dashboard management, and theme customization.
passed_tests: Downloads API with pagination and filtering
Home page loads with stats bar and filter buttons
Downloads table displays approved submissions correctly
Type filtering (ALL, Game, Software, Movie, TV Show) works
Submit page form validation and submission
Admin dashboard theme editor (dark/light mode, accent colors)
Navigation between all pages works correctly
Responsive design adapts to different screen sizes
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (20/20 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI flows working)
